A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw this on opening night and I have to say it is a fantastic execution on saving SW from the garbage J.J. Abrams gave us. If you are a fan of the creativity that was held in the old cannon and books\, you will enjoy this masterpiece. Finally\, we get an original story! I truly had A New Hope for the future of SW after watching this (until I found out J.J. is doing the next one) and will be watching it again in theaters soon.
